name: Tiny Soccer
description:
You are the ball.

Collect goals, avoid opponent.

This game is open source. Find the repository here: https://github.com/appsbu-de/lowrezjam2016

  • Developed by Carsten Sandtner (http://twitter.com/casarock).
  • Font: Kronbits - https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2016/topic/19413/mini...
  • Music: skrjablin - http://opengameart.org/content/sailor-waltz-with-w...
  • Sound Effects: http://www.bfxr.net/
  • All graphics by me (Carsten Sandtner)

Made for LowrezJam 2016!
